mapper.select: select r.*, f.r_file_path from review r, review_file f where r.r_num = f.r_num and r.p_num = #{pNum} order by r.r_num desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(P_NUM, R_NUM, R_WRITER, R_CONTENT, R_DATE, R_STAR) VALUES (#{pNum}, review_seq.nextval, #{rWriter}, #{rContent}, sysdate, #{rStar})
mapper.select: select round(avg(r_star)) from review where p_num = #{pNum}

select order_status from (select * from order_table ot JOIN order_detail od on od.order_num = ot.order_num WHERE OD.ORDER_DETAIL_P_NUM = #{pNum} AND ot.ORDER_USER_ID = #{rWriter} and ot.order_status = '배송완료' and ot.order_del = 'N' order by ot.order_date) where rownum <= 1
select r_file_path as rFile from review_file where r_num = #{rNum}
mapper.update: update review set r_content = #{rContent}, r_date = sysdate, r_star = #{rStar} where r_num = #{rNum}
